site_title: Octagonal Box (Lid and Base) by Tomoko Fuse

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This Beautiful Octagonal Box is designed by Tokomo Fuse. This model is a modular origami piece. It is compose of 8 sheets of square paper: 4 sheets of paper for the lid and 4 sheets for the base. Slightly Complex in the assembly but a really durable design. Perfect as a jewelry or gift box. give it try! This tutorial includes the lid and the base of the modular origami box. Enjoy! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art Origami Octagonal Box Tutorial timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:15 Paper Size Information 0:55 Octagonal Box Lid 1:05 Quick Overview of Folding the Octagonal Box Lid Module 1:42 Realtime Instructions for Folding the Octagonal Box Lid Module 4:06 Time-lapse for the Octagonal Box Lid Module 4:55 Octagonal Box Lid Assembly 6:53 Octagonal Box Base 6:58 Quick Overview of Folding the Octagonal Box Base Module 8:08 Time-lapse for the Octagonal Box Base Module 9:10 Realtime Instructions for Folding the Octagonal Box Base Module 14:44 Octagonal Box Base Assembly 16:29 Combining the Octagonal Box Lid and Base
